normalized: the night had passed.
i couldn't get miki out of my head afterwards and endedup passing a sleepless night unusually aroused.
i gave annerose her morning wakeup call as usual, but didn't try any funny business, what with being right on the heels of yesterday and all.
we also just got ambushed, so we decided to spend the day sitting things out indoors.
michiko's still passed out from that.
devil only knows when she'll get up.
so breakfast ended up being me, annerose and miki.
miki dug into the food i made like she was pretty hungry, seeing as she hardly touched her plate last night.
annerose had her customary three bowls of rice for breakfast and lunch.
she's a big eater.
i had a little bit of free time so i headed out back for some practice swings.
i can't really call this practical training.
but i figure it's better than nothing.
--at least, that's what i tell myself.
it's all because the feeling of being totally uselessyesterday still feels very real.

name: rikurou
normalized: yaah!
with both hands i swing the wooden stick down from high stance.
it makes a whooshing sound.
swing down, and tighten your grip at the end.
squeeze your palms together.

name: rikurou
normalized: w-was this how we did it back in kendo?
i continue my practice swings, thinking back to the kendoclass i had to take a long time ago and the club memberspracticing when i'd peek inside the dojo.
but it feels like i'm missing something.

name: rikurou
normalized: well yeah, 'cause up until six months ago i was just your everyday student… toryah!
whoosh!

name: rikurou
normalized: there's no way i'll get strong overnight like some hero or something… haah!
whoosh!
whoosh!

name: rikurou
normalized: but, if i'm the one chosen by annerose to be her eternal servant… uryah!
whoosh!
whoosh!
whoosh!

name: rikurou
normalized: maybe i've got some hidden power conveniently locked away inside me or something… yaah!
whoosh!
whoosh!
whoosh!
whoosh!
bzz～～

name: rikurou
normalized: ooh, beetle alert.
alright, i'll aim for him.
i get into high stance, aim carefully and…

name: rikurou
normalized: oryaahh!
whack!
bzz～～♪
the beetle flies away, happily buzzing.
yup, nothing but air.

name: rikurou
normalized: that's life for you.
i set my practice stick down and wipe my brow.
i've worked up a pretty good sweat.
not that it matters.

name: rikurou
normalized: so what happens now?
i can't just ask annerose to show me the ropes after all this time.
i should've done more back when i had the chance.
too late now, i guess…"

name: annerose
normalized: what're you mumbling about?

name: rikurou
normalized: woah!
annerose!?
i jump in surprise at the voice out of nowhere.

name: annerose
normalized: what're you doing out here swinging around this twig?
annerose looks at me covered in sweat and picks up the wooden stick i set down.

name: rikurou
normalized: o-oh, you know… just a few practice swings, ahaha…"

name: annerose
normalized: practice swings, huh?
annerose looks at me long and hard.
it's a look that says she's way past knowing where to even start with me.

name: rikurou
normalized: gah…"
i go red-hot in embarrassment from having someone see me swinging my so-called "sword" around.

name: annerose
normalized: well, whatever.
so saying, she brings the wooden stick up into high stance and, after holding for a moment, swings it down.
vssht!
it sounded different.
that blunt piece of wood is slicing through the air.
if that beetle from earlier'd been here i bet it would've been sliced clean in two without even touching it.

name: annerose
normalized: here you go.
i take it when she casually tosses it to me.

name: rikurou
normalized: …sorry, annerose.

name: annerose
normalized: ahn?
what're you talking about?

name: rikurou
normalized: i mean, i can't do anything right and i've got a power level of like, zero.
it's not like it's anything new, but actually saying it out loud feels kind of pathetic as a man.

name: annerose
normalized: it's not like it's anything new.
annerose says exactly what i'm thinking.
judging from her expression, she doesn't have a trace, a modicum, one single milligram's worth of surprise.

name: rikurou
normalized: (guh, i wanna curl into the fetal position…)

name: annerose
normalized: where'd this come from all of a sudden?
or what?
you thought you'd just start doing some practice swings?
with a hand on her hip and her head cocked to the side, she paints the picture of an older sister admonishing her naughty little brother.

name: rikurou
normalized: i mean, i know it's late in the game… and it's not about the whole 'it's never too late to start' thing… i just want to be a little more useful is all…"
the pathetic little brother mumbles out at the end.
annerose looks at me for a time.

name: annerose
normalized: do you want to protect miki?

name: rikurou
normalized: huh…?
i meet her gaze.

name: annerose
normalized: is that your reason?
her witch eyes have me trapped, threatening to suck me in.
reason.
the reason i want to become strong.
that's…

name: rikurou
normalized: i want to protect you!
before i knew it, i'd already said it.
and surprising even to me was that i had the words, "as your eternal servant" in my head, but i didn't say them.
annerose looks at me in amazement… or so it seemed.

name: annerose
normalized: pretty gutsy for a slave.
yup, just my imagination.
she looks the same as ever.

name: rikurou
normalized: sorry… that sounded kind of high and mighty.

name: annerose
normalized: i wouldn't call it that, i'd say you just don't know your place.

name: rikurou
normalized: r-right…"
she's merciless-- but then again, i can't help but hang my head in total agreement with her.

name: annerose
normalized: …sigh.
annerose lets out a sigh.

name: annerose
normalized: fine then.
i was thinking it's still a little early, but i'm going to tell you about the mindset of an immortal.

name: rikurou
normalized: the mindset of an immortal?
this is exactly the kind of advice i need right now.
i didn't think she'd be one to talk about this sort of thing.
i lean forward to soak this all up.

name: annerose
normalized: rick, what does 'pain' mean to humans?

name: rikurou
normalized: pain…?
well, let's see…"
what is pain?
" man, this is kind of on the spot.
headaches, stomachaches, muscle aches, sore throat, stiff shoulders, fractures, lower back pain, nerve pain -- plus the different types of pain too, like "heartache.
is that what annerose is talking about?
no, i think she's after something different.
what is pain… what is it… hmm, hmm…

name: annerose
normalized: pain is a limiter.
annerose asserted to me in my puzzlement.

name: rikurou
normalized: a limiter…?

name: annerose
normalized: it's a mechanism that lets people know their limits.

name: rikurou
normalized: i see…"

name: annerose
normalized: so then what is an immortal?
assuming death lies at the limits of pain, what does that make an immortal who can gobeyond that?
i'm not sure i know the answer to her question, but the last part piques my interest.

name: rikurou
normalized: you can go beyond the limits?
immortals can?
does that mean… i can?
i point at myself.
annerose nods.

name: annerose
normalized: that's right.
being able to transcend those limits is the true essence of an immortal.
class dismissed.

name: rikurou
normalized: d-dismissed…?
huh?
how am i supposed to go on anything with that…?
um, if possible, do you think you could you give me something a little easier to digest?

name: annerose
normalized: what're you talking about?
i just gave you everything and then some.
got it?
the true essence of something gets lostwhen you put it in words.

name: rikurou
normalized: 'don't think, feel?

name: annerose
normalized: yes, and the rest comes down to experience.
annerose pats me on the shoulder with a smile.

name: rikurou
normalized: still… easier said than done…"
the moment i murmured…
annerose's expression tensed up in a flash.

name: annerose
normalized: kh…!
she suddenly bends herself backwards to dodge.
sharp streaks of light shoot right where annerose had been standing not a second ago.

name: rikurou
normalized: woah!
i slip and fall backwards in surprise.
several thin ropes had come screaming in at an angle tothe ground.
the small, double-edged blades attached to their ends lie embedded in the earth.

name: rikurou
normalized: (wait, aren't these… rope darts!?
the moment i recognized them, the streaks of light then flew in the opposite direction, returning to the one who threw them.

name: rikurou
normalized: wha…!?

name: annerose
normalized: rick, don't just sit there!

name: rikurou
normalized: r-right!
chastised by annerose, i scramble back to my feet from where i'd been lost in surprise.

name: rikurou
normalized: (rope darts can only mean one thing…!

name: annerose
normalized: mayfeng!
annerose glares at our newly arrived foe.
mayfeng, annerose's sworn enemy.
accompanied by several assassins in the same outfits as the ones from yesterday.
the rope darts' blades gleam sharply in mayfeng's hands.
she's already in battle mode.
a continuation of yesterday?
i never thought she'd comefor us so soon.
and she even slipped into the grounds and ambushed us without annerose sensing a thing.
she's good.
scarily good.

name: annerose
normalized: i've gotta say, you've got guts to come sneaking into a witch's abode.

name: mayfeng
normalized: he doesn't seem to have come through here…"
mayfeng states to annerose with her arms crossed.

name: annerose
normalized: meaning what, exactly?

name: mayfeng
normalized: the werewolf.
we had him cornered and he ran off around here.
i've heard the rumors.
that monster's the brother of that little miki girl.

name: annerose
normalized: you don't say?
first i've heard of it.
annerose says completely straight faced.
but mayfeng doesn't buy it for a second.

name: mayfeng
normalized: okay, then.
seeing as i'm already here, hand over the girl.
she arrogantly commands.

name: annerose
normalized: not gonna happen.

name: mayfeng
normalized: i see.
that's just the answer i wanted to hear.
now i can kill you fair and square♪
mayfeng smiles sadistically and spreads the rope darts' blades like playing cards in her hands.

name: annerose
normalized: that'll be some trick for a lapdog.
annerose smiles and lowers her stance.

name: rikurou
normalized: (this is bad.
annerose is unarmed.
no matter how good she is, it's too risky for her to take on mayfeng barehanded.
i've gotta hurry and get kongo yasha…
but the moment i realize this, the assassins swoop in to cut off my escape.

name: rikurou
normalized: …kh.

normalized: you stay right there, boy.
you see, i happen to love torturing poor, helpless women to death.

normalized: you never cease to amaze me.

normalized: thank you.
now, let's start the--"

name: rikurou
normalized: (michiko!
nice one!

normalized: rick, take care of michiko!

normalized: huh…?
take care of her?

name: rikurou
normalized: (michiko!

name: michiko
normalized: abzz, abzz…"
she's asleep.

name: rikurou
normalized: you're going to sleep now!?
i blurt out in disbelief as i take off to protect our sleeping princess.
that was the sign to attack.

name: mayfeng
normalized: take this!
hundredfold rope darts!
mayfeng pulls her arms way back, then swings them over each other in front of her, unleashing her rope darts.
the innumerable weapons bear down on annerose, some flying straight for her as others arc in from all angles.
every one of them moves like a separate living entity.

name: annerose
normalized: huh, there aren't even a hundred of them!
far from trying to block them, annerose instead dodges with wild abandon, closing the distance between her andmayfeng.

name: mayfeng
normalized: what…!?
mayfeng goes pale at having her ultimate attack evaded.

name: annerose
normalized: haah!
with a loud roar from annerose, kongo yasha splits mayfeng in two.
--or it would have, if an assassin hadn't dove in at the last second and used himself as a human shield.

name: annerose
normalized: what…!?
she never expected an assassin to suddenly give up their life of their own accord.
that presented a tiny opening.

name: mayfeng
normalized: die, fool!
the deadly rope darts are unleashed once more.

name: annerose
normalized: tch… damned mudsnake!
annerose swiftly pulls back as she blasts away the hail of rope darts with kongo yasha.

name: annerose
normalized: the same goes for you!
she cuts down the assassins synchronizing their attackwith mayfeng's in the same stroke.

name: mayfeng
normalized: heheheh, this isn't the kind of fight for a witch used to playing hero, is it?

name: annerose
normalized: huh, i just can't stand evildoers, that's all.
mayfeng persistently keeps the pressure on from afar with her serpentine motions as the assassins continue their barrage.
annerose on the other hand steamrolls over the assassins in her path, closing the gap with mayfeng to unleash her fatal blow.
in a one-on-one fight, annerose's kongo yasha may have mayfeng's rope darts beat.
but even she has her hands full with mayfeng's inhuman methods, treating her lackeys as nothing more than cannon fodder.
and i don't have time to sit here worrying about her fight right now, either.

name: rikurou
normalized: dowawah!?
through some overestimation of my abilities, not one, but two assassins break off from the pack to take me on.
the claw attacks from either side yesterday are doubled today, driving straight for me.

name: rikurou
normalized: dammiit!
thanks to taking on their leader yesterday, i'm somehowable to follow their movements and barely able to dodgetheir attacks as well.
but between metal claws and a wooden stick, i'm the oneat a disadvantage.

name: rikurou

brzzt!

boom!

brzzt, brzzt!
boom!

crash!

normalized: kyaah!
the sound of breaking glass followed by miki's scream.

normalized: miki!

miss annerose!

well done, men!

count on it!
